text: Nizhal is a 2009 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Santhosh, starring Jagan and Sarayu in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/5887/malayalam/nizhal/index.htm ==Cast== * Sarayu * Jagan * Freddy * Ragh L Nath * Kalpana * Ambika Mohan * Devan * Kulappulli Leela * Kunchan * Machan Varghese * Saikumar * Salim Kumar ==References== Category:2009 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Nizhal
